textBeforeTable: Downloadable Information Membership Application Membership: Change of Status Form Membership: Insurance Reimbursement Request Membership at the largest human service organization in the world Summer access to Berkshire Community College’s outdoor swimming pool Participation in National YMCA’s AWAY reciprocal (Always Welcome at YMCA’s) program, outside of New England FREE access to almost every YMCA in New England (CT, ME, NH, RI, VT), as part of our My Y is Every Y program. Y members must present picture ID. Guest privileges Use of day lockers Men’s and women’s locker room with saunas Family-changing room Gymnasium/Basketball Court Weight Training Room and Boxing Training Room Racquetball courts Free initial orientation to safely use our cardio- and strength-training equipment Use of state-of-the-art cardio- and strength-training equipment A wide variety of FREE group exercise classes, including Yoga, Zumba, Boot Camp and Cycling (featuring Reebok and Keiser bikes) Access to Central Berkshire County’s largest indoor swimming pool (25 meters, 6 lanes) with adult lap lanes and family open swim times Reduced fees for youth and adult programs, including youth swim lessons, gymnastics, and sports A wholesome, family-oriented environment for you and your family Your membership gives you: Memberships TAP FOR MENU Contact Open Registrations Schedules/Forms
